content.value:
Work news: from Thursday, I will be Lead Developer on the Digital Identity programme at @gdsteam. If I’m honest this is a daunting challenge but I’m going to have the support of some great people.

As an old boss of mine used to say: “ever forwards!”
content.html: Work news: from Thursday, I will be Lead Developer on the Digital Identity programme at @gdsteam. If I’m honest this is a daunting challenge but I’m going to have the support of some great people. As an old boss of mine used to say: “ever forwards!”
